Fred Amata bụ onye Naijiria na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-emepụta ihe na onye nduzi ihe nkiri. Onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Theatre Arts na Mahadum Jos, Fred pụtara ìhè n'afọ1986 maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri akpọrọ Legacy
Ọ na-eje ozi ugbu a dịka onye isi oche nke Directors Guild of Nigeria, kemgbe Febụwarị 27, 2016.
